definition: soul brothers/friends in spirit who have never met/to commune with
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God, which was committed to my trust.
sentences.chinese: 这是照着可称颂之神交托我荣耀福音说的。

sentences.english: I also talked to a lot of self-help authors.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我还跟许多关于自助的书籍展开神交。

sentences.english: God entrusts parents to take care of children.
sentences.chinese: 神交讬父母亲来看顾教养孩子。

definition: to meet (in person)/to meet with sb
to know oneself/to be intimate or close/intimate friend
hearts linked as one, just as the proverbial rhinoceros communicates emotion telepathically through his single horn (idiom); fig. two hearts beat as one
pinyin: xin1 you3 ling2 xi1 yi1 dian3 tong1

definition: friendship between gentlemen, insipid as water (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3])
two hearts beat as one (idiom); a kindred spirit
see 惺惺惜惺惺[xing1 xing1 xi1 xing1 xing1]
